title: How to locate a cell phone that is disconnected - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I locate a cell phone that is disconnected? Here’s a general article that covers lost Android, iPhone, or Windows phones.[1] To answer your specific question, in the case of an iPhone, the “find my phone” app will report the last known location of the lost iPhone.[2] Footnotes[1] How to find my phone: Track a lost Android, iPhone or Windows Phone[2] Can I find my iPhone when the battery is dead?
